daily_themes.title: Presence with Allah
daily_themes.description: This week is about living with awareness that Allah sees you in every moment. Presence begins when the heart slows down and remembers Who it stands before.

daily_themes.title: Gratitude
daily_themes.description: Gratitude softens the heart and increases blessings. Noticing Allah's favors trains the soul to see abundance instead of lack.

daily_themes.title: Tawheed
daily_themes.description: True peace comes from knowing that Allah alone controls benefit and harm. This week strengthens reliance on Him alone.

daily_themes.title: Tawakkul
daily_themes.description: Tawakkul is doing what you can, then trusting Allah with the outcome. Let go of the need to control what is not yours.

daily_themes.title: Sabr
daily_themes.description: Patience is restraint for Allah's sake. It is choosing calm over reaction and faith over frustration.

daily_themes.title: Shukr Through Action
daily_themes.description: True gratitude is shown through obedience and restraint from sin, not words alone.

daily_themes.title: Seeking Forgiveness
daily_themes.description: Returning to Allah cleans the heart and restores closeness, no matter how many times you return.

daily_themes.title: Hope in Allah
daily_themes.description: Allah's mercy is greater than your mistakes. Hope protects the heart from despair.

daily_themes.title: Taqwa
daily_themes.description: Taqwa is being mindful of Allah before choices, words, and actions.

daily_themes.title: Sincerity (Ikhlas)
daily_themes.description: Worship is accepted when it is done for Allah alone, not for people or recognition.

daily_themes.title: Love of Allah
daily_themes.description: Love grows through obedience and remembrance, not emotion alone.

daily_themes.title: Mindful Dhikr
daily_themes.description: Dhikr with presence shapes the heart more than rushed repetition.

daily_themes.title: Reflection Before Reaction
daily_themes.description: Pausing before reacting allows wisdom to lead instead of emotion.

daily_themes.title: Patience with People
daily_themes.description: Patience with people tests restraint, humility, and trust in Allah's justice.

daily_themes.title: Gentleness
daily_themes.description: Gentleness beautifies speech and action.

daily_themes.title: Humility
daily_themes.description: Humility grows when the servant recognizes dependence on Allah in every success.

daily_themes.title: Forgiveness
daily_themes.description: Forgiveness frees the heart before it frees others.

daily_themes.title: Self-Control
daily_themes.description: Restraint strengthens the soul.

daily_themes.title: Truthfulness
daily_themes.description: Truthfulness aligns the tongue with the heart and strengthens sincerity.

daily_themes.title: Kindness
daily_themes.description: Small acts done sincerely carry great weight with Allah.

daily_themes.title: Lowering the Gaze
daily_themes.description: Lowering the gaze is the first defense of the heart.

daily_themes.title: Contentment
daily_themes.description: Contentment brings peace to the heart.

daily_themes.title: Silence with Wisdom
daily_themes.description: Silence becomes worship when it prevents harm and unnecessary speech.

daily_themes.title: Good Assumptions
daily_themes.description: Good assumptions purify the heart from suspicion and arrogance.

daily_themes.title: Avoiding Sinful Habits
daily_themes.description: Leaving sin opens doors to closeness with Allah.

daily_themes.title: Consistency
daily_themes.description: Allah loves consistent deeds, even if small.

daily_themes.title: Khushu in Salah
daily_themes.description: Khushu increases when prayer is slowed and honored.

daily_themes.title: Longer Sujood
daily_themes.description: Sujood is where the servant is closest to Allah.

daily_themes.title: Dua with Certainty
daily_themes.description: Allah hears every sincere dua.

daily_themes.title: Quran as Guidance
daily_themes.description: The Quran was revealed to be lived.

daily_themes.title: Morning Barakah
daily_themes.description: Early hours carry blessings.

daily_themes.title: Night Reflection
daily_themes.description: Ending the day with Allah brings peace.

daily_themes.title: Voluntary Salah
daily_themes.description: Extra prayers bring closeness.

daily_themes.title: Listening to Quran
daily_themes.description: The Quran softens hearts when listened to attentively.

daily_themes.title: Allah's Names
daily_themes.description: Calling Allah by His Names deepens dua.

daily_themes.title: Istighfar Lifestyle
daily_themes.description: Seeking forgiveness keeps the heart clean.

daily_themes.title: Salawat
daily_themes.description: Sending salawat connects the heart to the Prophet ﷺ.

daily_themes.title: Witr with Presence
daily_themes.description: Witr seals the night with sincerity.

daily_themes.title: Balance in Worship
daily_themes.description: Balance preserves sincerity and prevents burnout.

daily_themes.title: Seeing Allah in Creation
daily_themes.description: Creation points back to the Creator.

daily_themes.title: Mindful Walking
daily_themes.description: Movement can awaken spiritual awareness.

daily_themes.title: Honoring the Body
daily_themes.description: The body is an amanah from Allah.

daily_themes.title: Protecting Your Time
daily_themes.description: Time is a trust that disappears quickly.

daily_themes.title: Intentional Living
daily_themes.description: Actions are judged by intentions.

daily_themes.title: Serving Without Being Seen
daily_themes.description: Hidden good deeds purify sincerity.

daily_themes.title: Dua for Loved Ones
daily_themes.description: Dua strengthens bonds beyond words.

daily_themes.title: Healing the Heart
daily_themes.description: Hearts heal when turned toward Allah consistently.

daily_themes.title: Letting Go of Control
daily_themes.description: Surrender brings peace where control creates anxiety.

daily_themes.title: Remembering the Akhirah
daily_themes.description: The Hereafter clarifies priorities.

daily_themes.title: Living with Purpose
daily_themes.description: Purpose comes from aligning life with faith.

daily_themes.title: Review and Repentance
daily_themes.description: Repentance is a return, not a punishment.

daily_themes.title: Renewal and Intention
daily_themes.description: Every return to Allah is a new beginning.
